wikipedia_page.main: James Hodge (5 July 1891 – 2 September 1970) was a Scottish professional footballer who played in the Football League for Manchester United, Millwall, Norwich City and Southend United as a full back or centre half.

link_mentions.page: List of Norwich City F.C. players (25–99 appearances)

response: * James Hodge (politician) (1879–1946), British Liberal politician and lawyer
* James Hodge (administrator) (1876–1931), secretary of the Port Adelaide Football Club
